title: What's your Lux music?
body:
Basically, instead of the built-in music, what would you use for Lux?

Here's my pick:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qoP-jvoXNFI

replies.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GO6fQPFzKfs

I've been know to play this on repeat when playing her. >__>

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u6-U-apEUZI
Looped to remind how to play Lux.

There is only one correct answer:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p-WErNe1x18

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B_5CqGZbzYI 

this is what a I listen to, a parody on sailor moon theme song. XD

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NfQ8UtWqAsU

I heard that in a Lux video ages ago. It's been stuck in my head as the Lux song ever since.
